basic
open /yui2/latest_build/examples/dragdrop/dd-basic_clean.html
store +50 deltaX
store -30 deltaY
storeElementPositionLeft dd-demo-1 X
storeElementPositionTop //div[@id='dd-demo-1'] Y
store javascript{storedVars['deltaX']+','+storedVars['deltaY']} deltaStr
verifyExpression ${deltaStr} 123456
dragAndDrop //div[@id='dd-demo-1'] ${deltaStr}
storeElementPositionLeft //div[@id='dd-demo-1'] newX
storeElementPositionTop //div[@id='dd-demo-1'] newY
verifyExpression javascript{parseInt(storedVars['X'])+parseInt(storedVars['deltaX'])+''} ${newX}
verifyExpression javascript{parseInt(storedVars['Y'])+parseInt(storedVars['deltaY'])+''} ${newY}
